body_html: Actually, I saw the placement code, and I got some idea that if node A placed other device compare to node B which is in the colocate attribute value of node A. When I fixed the code to locate in same place with colocate node, it seems work. However It would be not a good solution.

body: Actually, I saw the placement code, and I got some idea that if node A placed other device compare to node B which is in the colocate attribute value of node A. When I fixed the code to locate in same place with colocate node, it seems work. However It would be not a good solution.
